name: Take A Breather, Baby!
description:
You don’t have to say much, just say it on the beat!

“Take A Breather, Baby!” is a Rhythm Visual Novel about dealing with everyday anxiety. Conversations turn cadenced as the music starts to rise, and Baby starts to panic. But don’t fret; just take a deep breath and focus on the rhythm of what’s being said. Before you know it, you’ll be dancing the fine line between overwhelmed and overjoyed. Don’t let intrusive thoughts get in the way of your success! Take a breather, and knock ‘em dead, Baby!

Controls:

- ESC to pause
- Spacebar to breathe
- Various Alphabetical Keyboard Keys for music inputs

**NOTE for WebGL: Please refrain from pressing the ESC key while in game! It may cause currently unsolved bugs!**
